original_title: Bandoneando: A Busca Pelos Bandoneonistas Negros da Campanha Gaúcha
overview: An unlikely adventure. Search the gaucho countryside for characters that official history ended up making unfeasible: black bandoneons, responsible for the introduction of the instrument in the state and for the conservation of its tradition. Hitting the road, Diego Muller visits villages, looking for friends, neighbors and relatives of people like the mysterious “Belo Bicho”.
title: Bandoneando: A Busca Pelos Bandoneonistas Negros da Campanha Gaúcha
